channel.title: Compile Error! Help! [562]
channel.description:
SOMEBODY HELP ME FFS!!! [Code] @echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... cd src .. copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling loginserver... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling packet handlers... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling logging system... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/SLF4JAppender.java echo Complete. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/*.java echo Complete. pause [/code]
That's the Code in compile.bat.. Here's the error. [Code] Preparing... The system cannot find the file specified. The system cannot find the file specified. Compiling core... Compiling loginserver... Compiling packet handlers... Compiling logging system... Complete. Complete. Press any key to continue . . . [/code] I need to know why the 1st 2 aint working!!!!!!!

item.title: Compile Error! Help! [562]
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

Make sure Java is in Program FIles and not (x86). Thats what caused me trouble in compiling. I had to make my own code since I had (x86).

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Error! Help! [562]
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

Dawg now itâ€™s saying I aint got JDK downloaded? What the bloody hell.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Error! Help! [562]
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

Located in Program Files

@echo off title j19283746's Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
Located in Program Files (x86)

@echo off title j19283746's Compiler if exist "%programfiles(x86)%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles(x86)%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles(x86)%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
~~~ Program Files (x86) Made by j19283746~~~
Your Welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Error! Help! [562]
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

SOMEBODY HELP ME FFS!!!

@echo off
title rs2hd compiler
echo Preparing...
cd src ..
copy log4j.xml ..
cd ..
move log4j.xml bin/
echo Compiling core...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo Compiling loginserver...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo Compiling packet handlers...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/*.java
echo Compiling logging system...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/SLF4JAppender.java
echo Complete.
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/*.java
echo Complete.
pause

Thatâ€™s the Code in compile.batâ€¦ Hereâ€™s the error.

Preparing...
The system cannot find the file specified.
The system cannot find the file specified.
Compiling core...
Compiling loginserver...
Compiling packet handlers...
Compiling logging system...
Complete.
Complete.
Press any key to continue . . .

I need to know why the 1st 2 aint working!!!

Read full topic
